channel.title: Doors and stairs problem!
channel.description:
[b]1[/b].Doors problem [b]2[/b].Stairs problem
Okay here is my doors problem. I have saw some tutorials where it shows how to spawn doors that fully opens and closes. I have tried those i fully understand em.But i have one question how to remove doors for example in falador white castle cuz i did spwned in the same coords in the same position same doors but it not opening and it shows same doors and new one that i spawned. I tried use method [i]deleteThatObject[/i] but not working so pl0x help mehh.
Okay here us my stairs problem. I didnt saw any tutorials how to do stairs working correctly so please anyone post link here or tutorial.
Thanks.

item.title: Doors and stairs problem!
item.dc:creator: @rash Rash
item.description:
@rash wrote:

I believe doors are “wall” objects which means the last number (usually a ten) would be 1

Read full topic
